---
title: 'unconfirmed_txs'
openapi: 'POST /json-rpc'
playground: 'interactive'
---
### Parameters

The parameters for method unconfirmed_txs: [limit].

- `params[]` (integer): The maximum number of unconfirmed transactions to return.

### Returns

<ResponseField body='result' type='object'>
  The list of transactions.
</ResponseField>

<RequestExample>

```bash Curl
curl --request POST \
  --url https://api.uniblock.dev/uni/v1/json-rpc?chainId=25 \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --data '{
    "id": 1,
    "jsonrpc": "2.0",
    "method": "unconfirmed_txs",
    "params": [
      10
    ]
  }'
```

```json JSON-RPC
{
  "id": 1,
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "method": "unconfirmed_txs",
  "params": [
    10
  ]
}
```

</RequestExample>
<ResponseExample>

```json Success
{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "id": 1,
  "result": {
    "n_txs": "82",
    "total": "82",
    "total_bytes": "19974",
    "txs": [
      ""
    ]
  }
}
```

```json Error
{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "id": 1,
  "error": {
    "code": -32600,
    "message": "Invalid Request"
  }
}
```

</ResponseExample>
